export const ib_cid = "transparency"

<div className="aiv-panel">
  <h2>User Responses: Transparency (Consumer Protection)</h2>
</div>
<br/>
<h2 className="c-primary">Testable Criteria 5.1.0: False or Misleading Representation</h2>
<h3>Outcome: AI Company should not make false or misleading claims for its models.</h3><br/>

<table style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse"}}>
  <tr>
    <td style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">5.1.1\) Question</b><br/>
      Does the AI company ensure that the claims made by the AI company comparing its AI models with competitor models clearly state the specific metrics and criteria used for comparison, providing transparent and verifiable information to consumers?
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>
      Claims comparing AI company's AI models with another competing model should clearly state specific metrics and criteria.
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Response</b><br/>
      {(props.getIBData(ib_cid)["5_1_1"])}
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>

</table>

<br/>

<table style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse"}}>
  <tr>
    <td style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">5.1.2\) Question</b><br/>
      Are the performance claims made in the marketing of AI model based on verifiable and substantiated data, and does the company have mechanisms in place to ensure the accuracy and truthfulness of performance-related statements?
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>
      Performance claims made by AI company should be verifiable and substantiated.
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Response</b><br/>
      {(props.getIBData(ib_cid)["5_1_2"])}
    </td>

  <tr>
    <td style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">5.1.3\) Question</b><br/>
     Are AI model designed and presented in a manner that ensures consumers can easily understand the features, capabilities of the AI models, without resorting to misleading or ambiguous language?
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>
      Consumers should be able to understand the features and capabilities easily.
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Response</b><br/>

    </td>
  </tr>

<br/>

<h2 className="c-primary">Testable Criteria 5.2.0: Inadequate Disclosure or Omission of Information </h2>
<h3>Outcome: Users should have to right information about the risks and limitations of the AI model.</h3><br/>

<table style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse"}}>
  <tr>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">5.2.1\) Question</b><br/>
      Where possible (e.g., not compromising IP, safety, or system integrity), does the AI company identify appropriate junctures in the AI lifecycle to inform end users, subjects and other relevant parties about necessary information regarding the AI system (e.g., the purpose, criteria, limitations, impact, and risks of the decision(s) generated by the AI system) in an accessible manner?
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>
      Ensure that users are informed of the AI model's information (including limitations in accuracy, if any).
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Response</b><br/>
      {(props.getIBData(ib_cid)["5_2_1"])}
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px", paddingTop: "10px", paddingBottom: "10px"}} colspan="3">
      <b className="c-secondary">Elaboration</b><br/>
      {(props.getIBData(ib_cid)["5_2_1_e"])}
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<br/>

<table style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse"}}>
  <tr>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">5.2.2\) Question</b><br/>
      Has the AI company provided the right information to users of the AI model to allow users to make informed choices (including being clear when an AI model is being used)? 
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>
      Ensure that users are able to make informed choices when using the AI model (including the knowledge of when an AI model is being used).
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Response</b><br/>
      {(props.getIBData(ib_cid)["5_2_2"])}
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px", paddingTop: "10px", paddingBottom: "10px"}} colspan="3">
